Package rooms

Class Room

java.lang.Object
rooms.Room
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bedroom, Cellar, Foyer, Kitchen, Lab, Tutorial
public abstract class Room extends Object
Provides the data and methods necessary to build an interactable room.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Room(boolean isLocked, Inventory inventory)
    Instantiates a new room with a specified inventory and lock status.

      Returns whether or not the room is locked.
      Returns:
      True if locked, false otherwise.

    • use

      public abstract boolean use(String toUse, String useOn)
      Contains the room-specific code for using items.
      Parameters:
      toUse - The name of the item to use.
      useOn - The name of the item to use it on.
      Returns:
      True if item was used successfully, false otherwise.
